League information

Source: R/league-settings.R
league_info.Rd

Basic information on a ESPN fantasy football league, like the name, size, and season length.

league_info(lid = getOption("lid"), old = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

lid

ESPN League ID, defaults to getOption("lid") (see set_lid()).
old

If FALSE (default), return only the current season's data. If TRUE, return a list with all prior seasons.
...

Additional API query arguments. Use "week" and "year" as a shorthand for "ScoringPeriodId" and "seasonId" respectively.

Value

A list or tibble of season settings.

Examples

league_info(252353, old = TRUE)

#> # A tibble: 5 x 6
#>    year name                           id public  size length
#>   <int> <chr>                       <int> <lgl>  <int>  <int>
#> 1  2015 Gambling Addicts Anonymous 252353 FALSE      8     17
#> 2  2016 Gambling Addicts Anonymous 252353 FALSE     10     17
#> 3  2017 Gambling Addicts Anonymous 252353 FALSE     10     16
#> 4  2018 Gambling Addicts Anonymous 252353 FALSE     10     16
#> 5  2019 Gambling Addicts Anonymous 252353 TRUE       8     16
